GetAudify.com is a versatile Google Chrome plugin that enhances your reading and learning experience by summarizing literature, turning text to speech, and responding quickly to your questions.

Key features:

Summarize Text Effectively:

Highlight any text to rapidly summarize it to the length you preferâ€”20, 50, or more words.
Customize the content tone and wording to meet your specific requirements.


Text-to-voice conversion:

Convert any selected text into natural-sounding voice to help you absorb information while on the fly.
Choose from a variety of voices and languages to improve your listening experience.


Quick Question & Answer:

Get answers to your questions by selecting text and using the Q&A tool, which provides accurate and concise answers.

User Dashboard on app.getaudify.com:

API Key Generation:

Easily generate and manage API keys to incorporate getaudify sophisticated capabilities into your own apps.
Usage Analysis:

Track your usage statistics to see how frequently you summarize, use text-to-voice, or use the Q&A tool.

History and management:

Access a complete history of your summarized texts, audio conversions, and Q&A conversations for convenient reference and administration.
getaudify is the go-to tool for managing digital content in a smarter, more effective manner. Whether you're a student, professional, or ardent reader, getaudify changes the way you engage with information, making it more accessible and manageable.

getaudify embodies the future of reading and learning. Visit GetAudify.com today to increase your productivity.
